Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE is followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE appears in variants that contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are resubmitted after any type of rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that directly lead to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER without prior rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus those followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of loops involving multiple rejections and resubmissions before final approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that immediately precede Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total rejections by PRE_APPROVER that originate from a Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (i.e., share of this activity in causing PRE_APPROVER rejections)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in the most common variant (no rejections) versus in variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that eventually reach Payment Handled without encountering any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to successful completion (Payment Handled) versus those leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed within the same case by a second submission after any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in cases where the PRE_APPROVER step is present but bypassed due to role consolidation (e.g., budget owner = supervisor)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that eventually lead to a rejection by any role (e.g., PRE_APPROVER, ADMINISTRATION, SUPERVISOR, BUDGET OWNER, or MISSING)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that skip the PRE_APPROVER step entirely
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events associated with case amounts above 100 euros that result in rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur in 2018 (university-wide data) compared to 2017 (two departments only), specifically in paths involving PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by any approval activity within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE made per month that later result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities
